root.message: The ADJUSTMENT field for indicator 6-4-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: Sources of discrepancies Differences might occur due to the following, amongst others: For national estimates incoming water is counted as being part of the countryâ€™s available water resources, while global estimates can only be done by adding up the internal renewable water resources (water generated within the country) of all countries in order to avoid double counting.
